title: Where is the law phenomenon observed in? - Quora

response.answer_text: One must know the meaning of LAW before a phenomenon?? Like what is that?? Law is Law ? Sometimes lawyers is broken as we are not perfect however when accused of breaking the law due to a mis interpretation is criminal ?? example: I was a engaged in a phone call as such with a particular female of a high standard position so to speak; Teamleader? Anyways to cut to the chase due to her ignorance is simulated communication ?? However for a team leader to manage in such away was a critical liability to a level of customer service required, and then due to the mis understanding between parties she offered which I respectfully aquatinted her to proceed with to the complaints department area?? Cause if it personal you would be able to access without no complexity right?? Anyways you are comical as I see you changing my written volcabulary therefore I will sign off the day!!
